page.title: 16LOCAL LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The Police are based at Hatton Green where there is a resident policeman. The whole principle is village community policing. This means that the police get to know the people of the area and they often get to hear about the crime before it happens. The next Police Station is the one at Hockley Heath, this serves the Rowington area. There are regular mobile patrols. The majority of "crime" is car based for example traffic offences on the A41. There are also a lot of accident problems on the A41. The other major problem is the rowdy town people in the country pubs. The area is fairly quiet and effectively policed.
